title: Hi, I am using Google Pixel 2xl from India,past four days my phone has charging issues
content:
My phone is not charging by the actual charger,I had to charge it only using a power bank with attached usb cable.Nothing else.I could connect the customer support they asked me to reboot even then the issue remains same.Now they want me to do factory reset! What needs to be done.kindly do help with this.
To add on am from India
